forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a crisp clarity envelopes the city, basking in shining sunlight. Temperatures approach a gentle high reminiscent of cool ocean breath, gradually settling into the welcoming embrace of 59 degrees. A refreshing west-southwest wind meanders through the streets, stirring the air at about 14 mph, with gusts that tease the sails of nearby vessels, offering a lively contrast to the tranquility of the day.

As dusk approaches, the evening anticipates softening temperatures, descending to about 50 degrees, where light clouds may drift across the sky, hinted at by the ever-present marine layer. The fog, typical of the region, remains fain, lingering perhaps at the edge of visibility, especially near the iconic Golden Gate. Nature’s tapestry invites one to relish outdoor activities—whether you find yourself wandering the shops of the Mission, enjoying a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, or settling into a café with a warm drink, the day offers both adventure and solace. Consider donning layers; a light jacket will provide comfort against the evening chill as you soak in the vibrant atmosphere of the city.
